termsAndConditionsDiscription: Welcome to Akila Jewellers for gold and silver ornaments.This website is owned and operated by Akila Jewellers and is officially registered in Dindigul, Tamil Nadu, India. By using the services provided by akilajewellers66@gmail.com, you agree to comply with the terms and conditions listed below, which may be updated periodically.Akila Jewellers reserves the right to modify these terms and conditions at any time, without prior notice, at its sole discretion. All rights, including copyrights, belong to Akila Jewellers. Without prior permission from Akila Jewellers, copying, storing, or reproducing any content from this website, either fully or partially, is strictly prohibited. If you have any questions regarding these terms and conditions or any feedback about our website, you can reach us at akilajewellers66@gmail.com or contact our help desk at Mob. 6384226384.
privacyPolicyDiscription: Protection and security of your personal information is one of **Akila Jewellers** top priorities. This privacy policy discloses **Akila jewellers** practices with respect to the information collected from the users of this website/mobile app. By using this website/mobile app, you agree to accept the terms of this privacy policy as well as the website/mobile app’s Terms of Use. By accessing or using this website/mobile app, you expressly consent to the use of our website/mobile app and the disclosure of your personal information in any manner described in this privacy policy.This privacy policy extends to both users who visit the website/mobile app but do not transact business on the website, as well as users who are registered on the website. Personal Information refers to any information that identifies or can be used to identify, contact, or locate the person to whom such information pertains, including but not limited to name, address, phone number, and email address.
privacyMidTitle: PLEASE READ THE FOLLOWING TERMS OF OUR PRIVACY POLICY ON PERSONAL INFORMATION COLLECTED
privacyPolicyDiscription2: By accepting this privacy policy, you authorize Akila Jewellers to collect, store, and use any information that you provide on our website/mobile app. The information collected by us includes all information entered by you on our website/mobile app, such as your name, address, contact number, email ID, and any other information sent by you via emails to our email ID.
question1: What is Akila Jewellers' Mobi Gold Scheme?
answer1: Acquire precious gold jewelry by depositing money online.
question2: How can I pay monthly installments?
answer2: Pay monthly installments via cash, UPI, NEFT, or IMPS to Akila Jewellers' account. Contact showroom for details.
question3: Can I purchase gold or other jewelry?
answer3: Gold and silver jewelry can be purchased as per terms and conditions.
question4: Can I close the account before scheme end date?
answer4: Jewelry will be delivered only after scheme completion. No refunds under any circumstances. Jewelry can be claimed as per rules.
answer5: Mobi Gold Jewelry Scheme enables secure online gold accumulation. Start with ₹100 minimum, add anytime. Redeem accumulated gold weight after 330 days with bonus benefits as below. Service charges and GST applicable.
answer6: Members agree to all scheme terms under Indian law. This scheme falls under Dindigul District Court jurisdiction. Valid ID proof required for jewelry collection post expiry.
answer7: Contact if receipt not received within 14 days of payment. Customers must verify payment records. Physical presence required for gold purchases. Submit all receipts during redemption. Applicable taxes apply.
answer8: We respect your privacy and handle personal information confidentially. We never share your data with third parties.
answer9: Only voluntarily provided information: name, email, addresses, phone numbers for orders, newsletters, contests, or feedback.
question10: How do we use your information?
answer10: To process orders, communicate updates, and send relevant offers. Unsubscribe anytime via email or link in communications.
question11: Do we share your personal information?
answer11: No sharing for marketing purposes. Payments processed through third-party providers with security certifications.
question12: How long do we retain your information?
answer12: Retained only as long as necessary to fulfill purposes: order processing or query resolution.
question13: What are cookies and how do we use them?
answer13: Cookies enhance online experience without storing personal data. They help with session management, shopping cart, and analytics. Used for service improvement and ad performance tracking.
answer14: Contact via website/email. Use valid contact details for efficient communication. Customers consent to transactional/promotional messages. Opt-out available for promotional content. We prioritize customer consent in communications.
